text: Nonnie Griffin (October 22, 1933 â€“ June 7, 2019) was a Canadian actress and voice actress. She was born in Toronto, Ontario. Her stage work includes Hello, Dolly!. She had live-action acting and voice acting roles in Star Wars: Ewoks, Kung Fu: The Legend Continues, King of Kensington, RoboCop: The Series, Forever Knight, Bizarre and Strange Paradise. She also appeared in the movies Care Bears Movie II: A New Generation, The Believers, Good Fences and If You Could See What I Hear. Griffin died of a ruptured aortic aneurysm on June 7, 2019. She was 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Deaths from aortic aneurysm
title: Nonnie Griffin
